title: Chrissy Teigen Cancelled, Whitney Family Feud, Delta Air Fight, A-Rod and more.
itunes:title: Chrissy Teigen Cancelled, Whitney Family Feud, Delta Air Fight, A-Rod and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve tells us about the most useless emotion as he starts the show. The CLO explains the difference between freaky and good. Steve talks about his bucket list. Steve the music lover, lit up on Family Feud while talking about the late great Whitney Houston. Chrissy Teigen is probably asking, "Why you bringing up old sugar honey iced tea?" Do the Brooklyn Nets have a problem or nah? The battle between A-Rod and J-Lo continues. Did the pandemic make one night stands obsolete or nah? Today in Closing Remarks, Steve brings up something he got from Joel Olsteen that has to do with the roar of a lion.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
